artiano.math.algebra

类 LUDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • artiano.math.algebra.LUDecomposition

  • public class LUDecomposition
extends Object

    Description: solve matrix equation like A*x=b.

    This class for solve the matrix equation like A*x = B, x is the solution. You can write the code like this:


    //A*x = B

    Matrix A = {{...},{...},...};

    Matrix b = {{...},{...},...};

    LUDecomposition decomposition = new LUDecompostion(A, false); //assume don't reserve

    Matrix solution = decomposition.solve(b); //solve the equation, assume don't reserve

    Matrix inversion = decompostion.inverse(); //get the inversion of A
    ...
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0.0
    作者:
    Nano.Michael, (latest modification by Nano.Michael)

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void decompose()
      decompose A the form like this: L*U = A, the L and U stored in a
      double det()
      calculate the determinant of the matrix
      Matrix inverse()
      solve the equation A*x=I, I is unit matrix and x is the inversion of A
      Matrix solve(Matrix b)
      solve the equation like A*x=b, x is the solution matrix
      Matrix solve(Matrix c, boolean reserve)
      solve the equation like A*v = b, v is the solution matrix

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LUDecomposition

        public LUDecomposition(Matrix a,
               boolean reserve)
        constructor
        参数:
        a - - the coefficient matrix
        reserve - - to indicate reserve the A whether or not, if reserve is not true, the matrix A will be replaced with L*U (L*U = A).

      • LUDecomposition

        public LUDecomposition(Matrix a)

    • 方法详细资料

      • inverse

        public Matrix inverse()
        solve the equation A*x=I, I is unit matrix and x is the inversion of A
        返回:
        - the inversion of A

      • det

        public double det()
        calculate the determinant of the matrix
        返回:
        - determinant of the matrix

      • decompose

        protected void decompose()
        decompose A the form like this: L*U = A, the L and U stored in a

      • solve

        public Matrix solve(Matrix b)
        solve the equation like A*x=b, x is the solution matrix
        参数:
        b - - input matrix
        返回:
        - solution

      • solve

        public Matrix solve(Matrix c,
           boolean reserve)
        solve the equation like A*v = b, v is the solution matrix
        参数:
        c - - specified constant matrix
        返回:
        - solution
